Text:
Tryed this but my copy is already in notification mode and wont change.

If any one has ideas please tell(i can login fine but am marked as not genuine so can't update directx and other features :(
^ to anyone with same issue run the rearm command(slmgr.vbs /rearm) after installing the loader and all seems good ^.^
used the rearm command, restarted, and ran 7loader again and it worked.  Thanks BungieM1!
